ENG                                                                [Note: Some time after publication of the IDS, the        
                                                                   designation for  Engelmann was changed from EN to ENG and 
                                                                   that for Engelhardt from ENG to ENH. This has lead to     
                                                                   considerable confusion between the two. All but three of  
                                                                   the ENG pairs in the WDS (ENG  21, 39, and 68) were       
                                                                   actually discovered by Engelhardt. These pairs were not   
                                                                   renamed, however, in order to avoid confusion with        
                                                                   already published measures.]
